name: Blood Love
description:
You stayed loyal to your duty.

Others did not.

They seek to end you.

You seek to end them.

All is necessity.

It must be done.

----

A short form adventure about obsession, revenge, and pain. 

----

I am a solo dev. This is my first RPG Maker game. Music and the non stock art by me. 

I hope you enjoy it!

Thank you for your time!
